product_name: Sierra Designs Flash 2 UL Tent - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The featherlight Flash 2 UL Tent offers 2 backpackers an awning and drop doors for 3-season protection from the elements and open-air living space for cooking and outdoor views in poor weather.
short_description: The featherlight Flash 2 UL Tent offers 2 backpackers an awning and drop doors for 3-season protection from the elements and open-air living space for cooking and outdoor views in poor weather.
